column2: I like this app because all the up date’s pictures are on the top of the page’s working on this iPhone 13 Pro Max

Please add option to add files to albums from the files. This is my only issue, i can only seem to add items to albums by going to album, clicking add, and searching for them. But if there was option to add from the file itself it would be a lot easier in some cases. 

Aside from that this is great, best photo app. U can add whole albums to hidden unlike the default app. Ads are no issue if u know how. 
It is a bit of a chore re-organising all files. It doesnt carry albums and folders over from main app. So u have to remake them all. But it is good

column2: Why should we pay for a gallery app for no ads it’s dumb bc now if u turn the Internet off it’s glitchy UPDATE IT PLS(great app if they update it so I’m giving it a 5 JUST PLS UPDATE IT LIKE THE OLD VERSION AND ALSO LET US ADD TEXT)

column2: Im unseated there are adds … but my screen went black for 15 miny till I don’t kill app. Also for short time when it’s work I wasn’t able to select photos as they automatically unselect after 3 sec
column7:

column2: I paid for this App and few months was good and after update new version start showing advertising I have to complain with Apple because it's not good at all
column5: Not Happy at all it's rubbish

column2:
